definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: The government's detention of Ai Weiwei appears to have been carefully planned.
sentences.chinese: 政府拘留艾未未的過程似乎經周密策劃。

sentences.english: Expeditions are planned in as much detail as a military campaign.
sentences.chinese: 如今的野外考察就好比軍事戰役一樣計劃周密。

sentences.english: You plan things very meticulously, right to the very minute.
sentences.chinese: 你將事情安排得很周密，精確到每一分鐘。

sentences.english: As long as you plan carefully, most thing are possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要你周密計劃，大多數事情是可能的。

sentences.english: Experts say that while rotational grazing can save money over time , it also requires planning.
sentences.chinese: 專家稱，雖然輪牧經濟省錢，它也需要周密籌劃。

sentences.english: The judge has taken the matter under advisement.
sentences.chinese: 法官已周密考慮了這一事情。

sentences.english: And even businesses with seamless, well-thought-out emergency plans can be ill prepared for the "real thing."
sentences.chinese: 甚至連天衣無縫的周密應急計劃都無法應付現實。

sentences.english: B: As long as you plan carefully, most thing are possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要你周密計劃，大多數事情是可能的。

sentences.english: Could we see the specifics for the X200?
sentences.chinese: 我們可以看一下X200型的周密小心規格嗎？
他的理論經不起周密的審察。

sentences.english: To make a thorough examination or conduct a detailed discussion.
sentences.chinese: 要想弄清事實，唯一辦法是作周密的調查。

sentences.english: Because of our well-conceived work, we frustrated enemy's plan.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們周密的工作，我們挫敗了敵人的計劃。

sentences.english: Rosenberg had been careful in planting false clues that would confound investigators.
sentences.chinese: 羅森博格細緻周密地佈置了假線索來擾亂調查員。

sentences.english: The danger can be avoided if we lay our plan carefully.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們的計劃周密，危險就可以避免。

sentences.english: They analysed the situation very closely.
sentences.chinese: 他們非常周密地分析了形勢。

definition: thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
Wanquan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
